title: Pharaoh’s Concubine - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Historical   Romance   Shoujo   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Amnesia   Ancient Times   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Clever Protagonist   Dreams   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Imperial Harem   Male Yandere   Royalty   S*xual Abuse   Time Travel   Unrequited Love
author: Yōu Shì   悠世
description:
Ivy, being both beautiful and smart, was the most loved daughter of the Marquis. However, God punished her unfortunate love for her brother, Ai Xian, by throwing her back to ancient Egypt using a strange serpentine bracelet engraved with a three-thousand-year-old love oath.

In ancient Egypt was Ramses II, the great regent prince and the heir to the throne. When he met her, everything started changing, including his fate.>
